aboutus.label: About Us
aboutus.desc: At Woof, we believe in the power of pet adoption. Every pet deserves a loving home, and we are here to connect you with your perfect furry friend. Our mission is to make the adoption process seamless and joyful. Join us in making a difference in the lives of pets and their new families.
makedonation.label: Make a Donation
makedonation.desc: Your support can make a difference! By making a donation, you contribute to our mission of helping pets find loving homes. Every little bit helps, and we appreciate your generosity
adoptionform.title: Adoption Form
adoptionform.desc: Please provide your information to complete the adoption process.
